name: gramps
description: Gramps is a self-hosted genealogy software that manages family relationships, events, and documents. It supports reporting, charts, media attachments, and offers both desktop apps and web deployments.

features.title: Family Tree Management
features.description: Build and maintain detailed family trees with relationships, events, and sources

features.title: Report Generation
features.description: Create family history reports, charts, and books in various formats

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Attach photos, documents, and audio recordings to people and events

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Track sources, citations, and research notes for genealogical accuracy

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Exchange data with other genealogy software using GEDCOM format
